We believe that death isnâ€™t scary. We hope to break down walls through deathscussions, gatherings, and art.
We believe that open and honest communication about death will make a difference in our culture.

By sharing the history of death, we can learn that death is not morbid and can elevate the human condition.
We wish to empower everyone to care for their dead and to honor end-of-life wishes for their special people.
